title: Dynamic Que primary roles
body:
Hi im a silver {{champion:34}} only player (yes i know im bad at the game) and i have recently been climbing playing her mid and top, mid being my primary role but recently i have been getting upwards of 10 - 15 min queue timers just to get my secondary role so its harder to carry this happens to me 8/10 games.

id like to make a suggestion to help improve this

allow players to force there primary role 

this will tell the system you don't want any other role but will make the queue times longer (but if your like me you don't care about the queue time as long as you get that role)

replies.body:
Why not make it optional for a secondary or even tertiary role rather than forced either way?

Give the individual the option of choosing between short queues or guaranteed roles.
you already have that option. it's called selecting fill. short queue for taking any role needed or get a guaranteed role of the 2 you choose for longer queue...

But you don't get a guaranteed role for 1 role you would prefer to have and wait for the longer queue time. You are forced to choose a secondary you may not even want.

If they gave players the options to choose from between 1-3 roles and not forcing them to choose multiple then the player can decide how long they want the queue to be rather than risking losing the role they prefer.
that means everyones queue time will be longer

> [{quoted}](name=FEED AND SUCCEED,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=dBNFv9mz,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-06-06T21:04:21.299+0000)
>
> that means everyones queue time will be longer

how so? if its optional fot a single player

really i have to explain it....

why do you think there's a secondary role in the first place? because it would take forever to match people if it was based on 1 selected role. especially when you consider how much more popular certain roles are compared to others.

you would just be making the pool of possible role/player combinations smaller and therefore everyone's queue time would be longer.
